alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:25PM EDT until July 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Washington County in southeastern Maine... East central Hancock County in southeastern Maine... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Ellsworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Bar Harbor, Cherryfield, Steuben, Millbridge, Hancock, Franklin, Gouldsboro, Lamoine, Trenton, Surry, Addison, Sullivan, Winter Harbor, Waltham and Sorrento. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
